Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:35:47 +0000 Niwa’s just-issued outlook for 2023-24 picks a normal-to-reduced risk for New Zealand’s neighbourhood, which typically receives at least one unwelcome visit from a cyclone system each November-to-April season.
